patthana23.52:0.2_0: (These should be expanded as in the previous discourse.)
patthana23.52:0.3_0: this is the precursor of the earth.
patthana23.52:1.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it, the cause or condition for the inferior.
patthana23.52:2.1_0: There is no cause or condition for the gaining of material possessions.
patthana23.52:3.1_0: if he doesn’t give rise to confidence in those without it.
